module: Module-level comment: The "generic_iobuf" module functions as a bidirectional IO buffer. It employs ports 'I' (data input) and 'T' (control input) to manage the bidirectional 'IO' port. When 'T' is low, 'IO' outputs the value of 'I', while high 'T' sets 'IO' to high impedance. The output 'O' mirrors the 'IO' state, enabling signal monitoring.
